frontmatter.title: My Journey as an LFX Mentee - Exploring E2E Testing with Playwright on Meshery
frontmatter.description: The journey began with a comprehensive exploration of Meshery's existing end-to-end (E2E) testing framework, built using Cypress. Gaining a deep understanding of the existing setup was crucial to ensure a seamless transition to Playwright.
